## Project: Private Jet Emissions Calculator
- **Tech Stack**: Next.js 14 App Router, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, ShadCN UI
- **Features**: Aircraft database (48 models), emissions calculator, comparison metrics
- **Deployment**: Vercel ready with proper SEO metadata

## Development Setup Complete âœ…
- [x] Next.js project scaffolded with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS
- [x] ShadCN UI components installed and configured
- [x] Complete aircraft database with 48 aircraft models
- [x] Emissions calculator with comparison metrics
- [x] Responsive design with dark mode support
- [x] Comprehensive documentation in README.md
- [x] VS Code tasks configured for development and build

## Key Components
- **CalculatorForm**: Main form with aircraft selection, distance input, passenger count
- **AircraftSelector**: Searchable dropdown with 48 aircraft grouped by category
- **AircraftInfoCard**: Displays detailed aircraft specifications
- **ResultsDisplay**: Shows emissions results and environmental comparisons
- **DistanceInput**: Distance input with unit conversion and popular routes
- **PassengerInput**: Passenger count with capacity validation

## How to Run
- **Development**: `npm run dev` or use VS Code task "dev"
- **Build**: `npm run build` or use VS Code task "build"
- **Note**: Requires Node.js >=20.9.0 (current: 20.7.0)

## Next Steps
- Update Node.js to >=20.9.0 for full compatibility
